title: Model View Controller (MVC)
content: A pattern in software design commonly used to implement user interfaces, data, and controlling logic.

title: Object-relational Mapping (ORM)
content: A technique used in creating a 'bridge' between object-oriented programs, and in most cases, relational databases.

title: Structured Query Language (SQL)
content: A domain-specific language used to manage data, especially in a relational database management sytem.

title: Express.js
content: A minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
